body.name: Secret Dry Spray Aluminum Free Deodorant for Women, Coconut and Hemp Seed Oil, 48Hr Odor Protection 4.1oz.(Pack of 3)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Instant dry feel and weightless protection on your skin
Secret Dry Spray Antiperspirant Deodorant also has pH balancing minerals
Free from heavy waxes and alcohol
Don’t break a sweat! You have peace of mind that you’re protected from odor.
feel extra-confident with the power of 48-hour sweat and odor protection.
body.description: Your demanding life deserves an anti-perspirant deodorant that can keep up with it. Secret Dry Antiperspirant Deodorant for women, is exactly what you need to take on whatever life throws at you. Its powerful yet gentle on skin 48-hour sweat and odor protection gets to work instantly, and dries just as fast, giving you weightless protection from dawn till dusk. And because you care about what you put on your body, we also have pH balancing minerals. From the gym to date night, feel extra-confident with the power of 48-hour sweat and odor protection.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #714 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #10 in Antiperspirant Deodorant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has a sweet vanilla smell like fresh buttercream cake frosting. It is not overpowering or cloying, but you do smell it a few times throughout the day. It feels dry right after application. I haven't had any irritation at all. The cost is a little high, but you do get a lot in a bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars one not working
reviews.reviewText: This can of secret deoderant will not spray each time it sometimes gives a spurt then stops. Would like replacement can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Secret Vanilla & Argon Oil
reviews.reviewText: It seems to work fine as far as an antiperspirant goes - the true test would come in the summer lol (it’s late November now). But - it holds up when I use the treadmill so that’s nice.The scent is - interesting. It’s a very sweet “vanilla.” Stronger scent than I’m used to (I usually use dove mens clean comfort, which is a soft spiced baby powder fragrance and perfect for me, a woman). So this scent feels very loud, verrrrry sweet yet I wouldn’t consider it a vanilla scent if I were to guess. It comes off as something more tropical? Can’t quite put my finger on it. The price was decent for a 3 pack but one of the cans doesn’t spray - that makes the price high-normal for just 2 antiperspirant bottles. I will go back to dove clean comfort. It smells so soft and doesn’t intrude upon whatever perfume I’m wearing that day. I want my underarms to smell nice - I don’t want people to smell my deodorant thru my shirt. Secret Vanilla & Argan Oil smells too powerful for my liking. IF you deal with underarm oder - this may be to your liking, tho!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Spray Does Not Work
reviews.reviewText: I have tried this product several times from the store and Amazon. Every can freezes up and stops spraying. I like the scent and how Secret works but they need to replace their spray mechanism. I relate the problem to the canned air you use to clean your computer keyboard…the can freezes and you can’t get anything out. I have had to throw away 4 bottles. What a waste!P.S. Call Dove. Their spray deodorant works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars offers effective odor protection
reviews.reviewText: Secret's Dry Spray Antiperspirant with Vanilla and Argan Oil is a game-changer. The delightful scent lasts for a solid 48 hours, keeping me fresh and confident. The unique blend of vanilla and argan oil not only offers effective odor protection but also leaves my skin feeling nourished. It's my go-to choice for all-day dryness and a subtle, pleasant fragrance. Highly recommend for those seeking a reliable and indulgent deodorant experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite deodorant!
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant has great staying power and dries down smooth in a flash, unlike some other spray deodorants that can leave a sticky feel. I first tried the peach scent when my usual vanilla was out of stock and I was pleasantly surprised - the peach actually smells light and fresh and not like the peach candy I was afraid of. I wish they made these in travel size too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW. IMPRESSIVE RESULTS
reviews.reviewText: I had been dealing with BO for a few months now. In the past, I never had a body odor, not even when I hadnt showered in a few days. But all of a sudden, about 3 months ago, I began to experience BO even after using deodorant... sometimes even after using two deodorants at a time. I changed out deodorants, I used different types to no avail. This BO would even occur halfway through the day with no physical exertion. I was concerned, but having not seen a doctor yet I wanted to see if I could stop it at home before I see the doctor. I was honestly not expecting this product to work, but it was on sale, so I said what the heck, let me try it. Well, as I write this, I have not showered in two days and I have no BO. None at all.. In fact, I smell good. I can literally smell peaches or whatever perfume they stuffed into that bottle of spray. I dont know by what mechanism this is occuring. I hope its not cancerous. But I have no BO. I was concerned that a deodorant this strong would be difficult to wash off my armpits, the way my antiperspirants tend to be, but its very easy to wash off. I have subscribed to recurring deliveries of this thing. It works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It ok deodorant
reviews.reviewText: This product is ok it works in terms of you don’t get smelly and sweaty, the only thing I didn’t like is it leaves your armpits sticky for too long it task a while to dry
